title: Create Collection screen cuts off labels
description:
Was running a Solr 7.0 snapshot (commit 5ef60af) and noticed that the create collection pop up cuts off some of the argument names. Specifically, the replicationFactor and maxShardsPerNode.

Would be nice to use a bigger box or line wrap there, maybe. Have not tested other versions, but also saw the same behaviour on Chrome 53.0.2785.143 on Ubuntu.

Screen shot attached.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: I have tweaked the dialog CSS a bit. It seems to work on Firefox and Chrome, both on Mac. Could you please check it on whatever you saw the problem in the first place.
